original_title: André Rieu - Dancing Through the Skies
overview: A concert with André Rieu which takes place in one of the most beautiful opera houses in the world, the famous Semper Opera in Dresden. As well as the famous ‘Vienna Debutantes’, there are 40 fabulous pairs of dancers from the same Elmayer Dance School in Vienna, the sopranos Mirusia Louwerse and Carmen Monarcha, the Platinum Tenors, baritone Morschi Franz and the Johann Strauss Orchestra and Choir. The audience at the Semper Opera are not just enthusiastic, they are delirious... carried along by the beautiful waltzes, the fiery paso doble, the gorgeous arias from opera and operettas, humorous scenes, and moving songs from The Phantom of the Opera. Dancing Through The Skies - A better party atmosphere than this you cannot imagine!
tagline: André Rieu Live in Dresden: Wedding at the Opera
title: Wedding at the Opera
